downloadTitle: Microsoft .NET Framework 4.6.1 Language Pack (Offline Installer) for Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 10, Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1, Windows Server 2012 and Windows Server 2012 R2
downloadDescription: The .NET Framework 4.6.1 Language Pack contains localized resources for supported languages.
detailsSection: The .NET Framework 4.6.1 Language Pack contains translated error messages and other UI text for languages other than English. If you don't install a language pack, this text is displayed in English. You can install multiple language packs on one computer, each for a different language. You need to download and install the .NET Framework 4.6.1 (offline installer) prior to installing the language packs. You can find the .NET Framework 4.6.1 (offline installer) here.
systemRequirementsSection:
Supported Operating Systems:
  • Windows 7 SP1 (x86 and x64)
  • Windows 8 (x86 and x64)
  • Windows 8.1 (x86 and x64)
  • Windows 10
  • Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1 (x64)
  • Windows Server 2012 (x64)
  • Windows Server 2012 R2 (x64)

Minimum Hardware Requirements:
  • 1 GHz or faster processor
  • 512 MB of RAM
  • 640 MB of available hard disk space
installInstructionSection:
On this page, choose the Download button.
    • To install the software now, choose the Run button.
    • To install the software later, choose the Save button. (When you install, the computer must be connected to the Internet.)
additionalInformationSection:
Please see the Knowledge Base Article KB3102437 for more information.

This version of the .NET Framework language pack installs side-by-side with the .NET Framework 3.5 SP1 language pack and earlier versions, but performs an in-place update for the .NET Framework 4, .NET Framework 4.5, .NET Framework 4.5., .NET Framework 4.5.2 and .NET Framework 4.6 language packs.

For important information about this release, see the .NET Framework 4.6.1 Readme File.
